text: Anarsia silvosa is a moth in the family Gelechiidae. It was described by Ueda in 1997. It is found in Japan (Honshu, Kyushu).Anarsia at funet The length of the forewings is 6.6-7.5 mm for males and 7.3 mm for females. The forewings are whitish grey, scattered with pale brownish grey and blackish scales. The hindwings are brownish grey scattered with fuscous.A revision of the Japanese species of the genus Anarsia Zeller (Lepidoptera, Gelechiidae) ==References== silvosa Category:Moths described in 1997 Category:Moths of Japan
title: Anarsia silvosa
